title: Run pre-flight checks for FO-05
description:
Verify the codebase is in a healthy state before starting FO-05 implementation.

Commands to run:
- npm run build (verify build passes)
- npm run lint (verify no lint errors)
- node --import tsx e2e/fo-04.test.ts (verify existing E2E test passes)

Document any pre-existing failures.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; npm run lint shows no errors; FO-04 E2E test passes
closed_reason: Pre-flight checks completed: build passes, lint passes, but FO-04 E2E test fails with chip selection flakiness - test clicks chips but they don't appear in input field, causing Next button to remain disabled
